text: Yenisey Stadium is a demolished outdoor sports venue in Krasnoyarsk, which in December 2018 was reopened as an indoor arena. It is the home of Yenisey.http://www.rusbandy.ru/club/6/ At the 2019 Winter Universiade the new indoor stadium hosted bandy matches.SPORTSIce Stadium «Yenisei» Video of the building process ==References== Category:Bandy venues in Russia Category:Sport in Krasnoyarsk
title: Yenisey Stadium
